title: Science Fiction - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/1/21
itunes:title: Science Fiction - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/1/21
description:
George Noory and author Kevin J. Anderson discuss his career as a science fiction writer with novels in the Dune, Star Wars and X Files series, as well as how future trends and technology seen in science fiction films eventually make their way into our modern world.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
